abstract: Wladimir Klitschko will defend his heavyweight titles against Bryant Jennings in April 2015 bout at Madison Square Garden.
lead_paragraph: Klitschko will defend his W.B.A. and I.B.F. heavyweight titles against Bryant Jennings on April 25 in his first fight in the United States in seven years.
snippet: Klitschko will defend his W.B.A. and I.B.F. heavyweight titles against Bryant Jennings on April 25 in his first fight in the United States in seven years.

headline.main: Wladimir Klitschko to Fight at Madison Square Garden
headline.print_headline: Klitschko to Fight at the Garden
